inclusion.criterion: Female volunteers in early to mid-puberty
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hyperandrogenism (e.g., hirsutism, elevated free testosterone level)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than 12 g/dl and hematocrit less than 36%
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Persistently abnormal sodium, potassium, or bicarbonate
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Persistently elevated creatinine, hepatic transaminases, or alkaline phosphatase
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin > 1.5 times upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 33-year-old woman with Hashimoto's thyroiditis, who has been treated with Levothyroxine and has shown significant improvement in symptoms.
